Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.observer

Interface Observable<P extends Observer>

Type Parameters:
P - The Observer subclass
All Known Implementing Classes:
CtrlNode, SimNode, StateMachineEngine
public interface Observable<P extends Observer>
A class that can send messages about its state to Observers of the specified type. Internally, it maintains a dynamic list of registered Observers to send messages to.
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 14 ao√ªt 2019

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      void addObserver​(P listener)
      Registers an Observer to this instance
      Parameters:
      listener - the Observer to add

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage​(int msgType, Object payload)
      Sends a message to all registered observers. Messages are typed so that different actions can be triggered in the observer, based on type.
      Parameters:
      msgType - the message type
      payload - a payload to send to all observers

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver​(P listener)
      Removes an Observer from its list
      Parameters:
      listener - the Observer instance to remove

    • hasObservers

      boolean hasObservers()
      Check if there are registered observers.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one registered observer

    • observers

      Collection<P> observers()
      Get the list of registered observers.
      Returns:
      the immutable list of registered observers
